body: What if you use an ASCII character in your test?

This error seems to occur only with CJK charactor. 

```powershell
PS Z:\> [pscustomobject]@{"Text" = ("ア" * 200) } | Format-List

out-lineoutput: startIndex cannot be larger than length of string. (Parameter 'startIndex')
PS Z:\> [pscustomobject]@{"Text" = ("한" * 200) } | Format-List

out-lineoutput: startIndex cannot be larger than length of string. (Parameter 'startIndex')
PS Z:\> [pscustomobject]@{"Text" = ("圀" * 200) } | Format-List

out-lineoutput: startIndex cannot be larger than length of string. (Parameter 'startIndex')
PS Z:\> [pscustomobject]@{"Text" = ("ｱ" * 200) } | Format-List

Text : ｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱ
       ｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱｱ


PS Z:\> [pscustomobject]@{"Text" = ("A" * 200) } | Format-List

Text : AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
       AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA


PS Z:\> [pscustomobject]@{"Text" = ("a" * 200) } | Format-List

Text : aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa
       aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa

Text : 😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀�😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀😀�

Text : 你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你�你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你你�

```

No error in PowerShell-7.2.0-preview.8
It seems that this bug has been solved in `7.2.0-preview.5`.
[#13551](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/13551)
@kumamiko Thanks for your investigations! I close this as duplication of #13551. We can reopen if needed.
